title: Osfoora for Twitter 1.2.1 (Mac App Store)
description:
Description:

Osfoora is a powerful Twitter client with a clean and intuitive user interface. You'll enjoy a wide set of powerful features such as Muting users, Read Later, Message Conversations, Multiple Accounts, and more.

FEATURE LIST:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multiple accounts with multi-windows.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ TweetMarker Support: Timeline syncing of reading position between different Twitter apps.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Inline picture thumbnails for popular services, e.g. Instapaper, Twitter, Yfrog, and more.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Mute users.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Mark Tweets belonging to specific users.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Attach multiple images/videos to tweets.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Image Services: Yfrog, TwitPic, Twitter, CloudApp, Imgly.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Set your own custom Image Upload end point (Must follow the TwitPic API and use JSON).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Video Services: TwitVid, Yfrog, TwitPic, CloudApp.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Read Later (Instapaper & Read It Later) with tweet attribution.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ URL Shortening via CloudApp (Default is Twitter).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ View/Subscribe to Twitter lists.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Access Twitter lists from user profiles (Lists they created, follow, or followed by)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Direct Messages with conversation view.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search Twitter and view trends.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flexible Font sizes (11pt - 20pt).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ View users on Favstar, and Twitter websites.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Notifications via Growl and Dock Icon.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit your Twitter profile info.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Resizable Sidebar.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Robust Keyboard controls for navigation and popular tasks.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Other features such as Blocking users, Reporting Spam,
Requirements: Mac OS X 10.6 or later


What's New in Version 1.2.1

- Sandboxing Enabled

Bug Fixes:
- Mentions not showing up in main timeline
- 10.6.8 issues
- Incorrect mention detection
- Right click issue when using Contrl+Click
- Incorrect follow status message when following new users.
